pages.text: $(li)This Enchantment can only be applied in a $(l:patchouli:perks/backpack)$(l:patchouli:perks/backpack)Backpack$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)The Funneling enchantment makes it so that every drop got for mining or harvesting will be placed directly into the $(l:patchouli:perks/backpack)Backpack$(/l) instead of your main inventory.
pages.title: Funneling
